official_title: A resolution to establish a timetable for Senate consideration of an action on legislative proposals relating to continuing congressional oversight of Government intelligence and other surveillance  activities.

summary.text: Declares the sense of the United States Senate that Frances G. Knight be commended for her outstanding service to the Nation upon the occasion of her retirement from Federal Service.

titles.title: A resolution to establish a timetable for Senate consideration of an action on legislative proposals relating to continuing congressional oversight of Government intelligence and other surveillance  activities.
